## ColorMapLegend.setDigits() method

Set the number of decimal digits used in the tick labels

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDigits(digits: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  digits | number | The range number of decimal digits |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
